docs.lead_paragraph: BART Scrambles for Federal Funds | The Federal Transit Agency has threatened to give away $70 million in economic stimulus funds slated for the extension of BART to Oakland International Airport unless BART prepares an adequate analysis the project's impact on the poor and minorities in its path. BART officials hope to break ground on the 3.2-mile extension this summer. Critics have called the extension a "ski lift to the airport" for the elite. "I think this is a problem of process," said James Fang, the president of BART's board. "We are confident we can beat back this last obstacle to the project." [The Oakland Tribune]

headline.main: Sampler: BART Airport Extension in Trouble and a Reward for a Missing Goat

docs.lead_paragraph: Overview | Does seeing the unusual flora and fauna in the movie "Avatar" inspire a sense of wonder at the natural world? How might the film awaken interest in plant and animal life on Earth? In this lesson, students reflect on their experiences with nature, compare it to their impressions of the fictional Pandora and then use their observation and research skills skills to investigate awe-inspiring living things here on Earth. They then construct fantastical beings using features of the organisms they studied.

headline.main: Nature's Call: Drawing Inspiration From 'Avatar' to Study and Create Organisms

docs.abstract: Lesson Plan | Awakening the "inner biologist," inspired by the movie world of Pandora, to look closely at flora and fauna and to create imaginary beings based on real organisms.
docs.snippet: Lesson Plan | Awakening the "inner biologist," inspired by the movie world of Pandora, to look closely at flora and fauna and to create imaginary beings based on real organisms.

docs.lead_paragraph: She was a retired college professor, living alone in a New York apartment that had become unmanageable. When she called Bergfeld's Estate Clearance Service for help, Kristin Bergfeld had trouble entering the apartment; the professor had to move objects out of the way simply to open her front door.
